name: JobWatch
description: JobWatch is an Employment Rights Legal Centre which provides a free and confidential telephone information and referral service to Victorian workers about their rights at work.

name: Fair Work Ombudsman
description: The Fair Work Ombudsman investigates and prosecutes alleged breaches of awards, workplace agreements and the Commonwealth Workplace Relations Act 1996.

address.address: Level 6 414 La Trobe Street Melbourne VIC

name: Australian Council of Trade Unions
description: Trade unions can help their members with many employment issues, including pay conditions, unfair dismissals and apprenticeship and traineeship disputes, under state and Commonwealth awards. They can also help members with workers’ compensation disputes under state and Commonwealth awards.

name: WorkSafe Victoria
description: WorkSafe Victoria manages the workers compensation scheme and investigates breaches of occupational health and safety laws. There is information on their website about making a claim and returning to work after you are injured at work.

address.address: Office 1, Level 2 Central Square 18 Armstrong Street South Ballarat
171-191 Hammond Avenue Cnr English Street Essendon Fields

name: WorkCover Assist
description: WorkCover Assist is a free service provided by WorkSafe Victoria to help injured workers who have a workcover dispute with their employer. The staff will explain the conciliation process and will attend a conciliation conference to assist the employee.

name: Australian Taxation Office
description: Contact the Australian Tax Office's Superannuation Hotline on 131 020 for enquiries and services on superannuation.

address.address: Dandenong Service Centre Level 1, 27–29 Robinson St DANDENONG  VIC
Geelong Service Centre 12–14 Little Ryrie St GEELONG  VIC
Collins Square 747 Collins St DOCKLANDS VIC

name: Department of Industry
description: If you are an independent contractor, the Department of Industry has information about your rights and a range of support services. You can also call its hotline on 13 28 46 to speak to an advisor about a range of independent contracting matters.

address.address: Industry House 10 Binara Street Canberra ACT

name: Community legal centre
description: Your local community legal centre can give you legal information and advice. Most services are free.
